title: Most Cops Involved in High-Profile Killings Since 2014 Kept Their Police Licenses
description:
An Intercept investigation reveals how rare it is for officers who use excessive, deadly force to be barred from working as cops.

The post Most Cops Involved in High-Profile Killings Since 2014 Kept Their Police Licenses appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Leading Democrat in Maryland Senate Race Once Blamed Murders On Decriminalized Pot
description:
Prince George’s County Executive Angela Alsobrooks ran tough-on-crime campaigns for prosecutor. Now she’s fashioning herself as a reformer.

The post Leading Democrat in Maryland Senate Race Once Blamed Murders On Decriminalized Pot appeared first on The Intercept.
